description: A NPM version of the Atmosphere percolate:meteor_server_info package.
//: sprintf-js is only used by doc/algorithms.js
engines#1: We specify npm >= 2 to get proper local dependency support in
engines#2: application itself ; this is not a package dependency per se.
name: meteor_server_info

scripts.compile: rm -fr lib/* ; rm -fr node_modules ; meteor npm i && meteor npm run test-compile
scripts.cover: meteor npm run test-compile && time -p jest --detectOpenHandles --coverage __tests__/**/test.*
scripts.doc: rm -fr out ; typedoc --out out src --readme README.md  --module commonjs; cp screenshot.png out
scripts.test: meteor npm run test-compile && time -p jest --detectOpenHandles            __tests__/**/test.*
scripts.test-ci: npm run test-compile && time -p jest --detectOpenHandles --coverage __tests__/unit/test.ts; rm -fr build
scripts.test-integration: meteor npm run test-compile && time -p jest --detectOpenHandles            __tests__/integration/test.ts
scripts.test-unit: meteor npm run test-compile && time -p jest --detectOpenHandles            __tests__/unit/test.ts
scripts.ts-compile: rm -fr build/* src/*.js src/*/*.js; tsc --version; tsc -p tsconfig.json; mv lib old_build; mv build lib; rm -fr old_build
scripts.ts-compile-tests: rm -fr lib src/*.js src/*/*.js; tsc --version; tsc -p tsconfig_test.json
